"Shioji": "I'm currently looking into the Ores available here in Stia, but I need more information."
"If it's alright with you, I was wondering if you'd be willing to help me with an investigation?"
"Specifically, I need you to get some data on the Ore known as \"Hexakite\"."
"Apparently that Ore can be found in Outer Mediola: Sector 2, or so I hear."
"Word is, even combat veterans have trouble safely traversing that area by themselves."
"If someone like me went there alone, well... I reckon that'd be all she wrote."
"So I'm counting on you here. Stay safe!"
